search.query: |rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head splunk_server_group="$dmc_group$" /services/shcluster/status|head 1|fields captain.label|rename captain.label AS captain_label

| rest splunk_server_group=dmc_group_search_head splunk_server_group="$dmc_group$" /services/server/info | fields + splunk_server | eval host_list="\"".splunk_server."\"" | stats values(host_list) as host_list | eval host_list=" (".mvjoin(host_list, ", ").")"

panel.title: compare how often an email alert is fired vs how often the search artifact is accessed

search.query:
index=_internal host IN $host_list$ source=*splunkd_ui_access.log status!=303 | rex field=sid "scheduler__\S+__\S+__(?<savedsearch_name>\S+)\_at\_" | stats count as "accessed" by savedsearch_name status | rename savedsearch_name as ssn
| append [search index=_internal host IN $host_list$ sourcetype=splunk_python Sending email | rex field=results_link "scheduler__\S+__\S+\__(?<savedsearch_name>\S+)\_at\_" | stats count as "fired" by savedsearch_name | rename savedsearch_name as ssn]
| join ssn [search index=_audit host IN $host_list$ sourcetype=audittrail action=search info=completed
| rex "\'scheduler__\w+__\w+__(?<ssn>\S+)\_at" | dedup ssn savedsearch_name | table savedsearch_name ssn] | stats list(status) as status list(accessed) as accessed sum(accessed) as total_accessed max(fired) as fired by savedsearch_name | foreach accessed, total_accessed,fired [ rex field=<<FIELD>> mode=sed "s/^[\r\n\s]+$$//" | eval <<FIELD>> = if(isnull(<<FIELD>>) OR len(<<FIELD>>)==0, "0", <<FIELD>>)] | fillnull value="null" status | eval access_ratio%=round((total_accessed/fired)*100,2) | sort +"access_ratio%"

html.p: Click on savedsearch_name to see alert details.

search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches splunk_server=$captain_name$ | where is_scheduled=1 | search title="$a$" | table title cron_schedule schedule_priority allow_skew eai:acl.owner eai:acl.app search actions action.email.to alert_type alert_comparator alert_threshold alert_condition | rename title as savedsearch_name eai:acl.owner as owner eai:acl.app as app

table.title: when email alerts were fired for $a$

search.query:
index=_internal host IN $host_list$ sourcetype=splunk_python Sending email | rex field=results_link "scheduler__\S+__\S+\__(?<savedsearch_name>\S+)\_at\_" | rename sid as search_id savedsearch_name as ssn | join ssn [search index=_audit host IN $host_list$ sourcetype=audittrail action=search info=completed
| rex "\'scheduler__\w+__\w+__(?<ssn>\S+)\_at" | dedup ssn savedsearch_name | table savedsearch_name ssn] | table _time host savedsearch_name search_id subject results_link recipients server | search savedsearch_name="$a$"
